tier2_001.description: Aspirin pKa and Solubility: pKa = 3.49 at 25°C; Solubility at 25°C: Water = 3.3 mg/mL; At 37°C: Water = 6.0 mg/mL

tier2_002.description: Ibuprofen Conformational Analysis: Crystal structure shows extended conformation; pKa = 4.91 ± 0.04; logP = 3.97; Multiple low-energy conformers expected within 2-3 kcal/mol

tier2_003.description: Caffeine Multi-Property Analysis: Aqueous solubility = 21.6 mg/mL at 25°C; Dipole moment = 3.64 D in chloroform; MW = 194.19 g/mol; logP = -0.07

tier3_001.description: Warfarin Tautomer-pKa Relationship: pKa = 5.0-5.1 for enolic OH; Exists as cyclic hemiketal (>80%) at physiological pH; Plasma protein binding = 99%; Multiple tautomers in equilibrium

tier3_002.description: Acetaminophen Metabolic Sites: Phenolic OH = primary metabolic site for Phase II conjugation; Fukui indices should show highest reactivity at para position to OH; Oral bioavailability = 63-89%; t½ = 1.5-2.5 hours

tier3_003.description: Atorvastatin Conformer-Activity: IC50 = 8 nM for HMG-CoA reductase; Crystal structure shows extended conformation with specific H-bonds to Ser684, Asp690, Arg590; Binding energy should correlate with nM potency (ΔG ≈ -11 to -12 kcal/mol)
